name: Eliot 'Spark' McAllister
dialogue_tone: A unique, deep and resonant voice with an edge of impatience, suggesting a quick-paced mind often jumping from topic to topic; becomes notably more animated when discussing engineering projects or baking.

personality_traits.description: Known for designing innovative solutions for complex problems, ability to think outside the box sets him apart.
Deeply passionate about work and prone to losing temper under stress.
Nature serves as a source of inspiration.
Indulges in food to cope with stress when projects don’t go as planned.

living_conditions: Lives in a city apartment close to work, maintaining a hectic work-oriented lifestyle but balances with nature outings during weekends.
Enjoys baking and experimenting with new recipes as a relaxation method.
Regularly seeks opportunities to enhance engineering skills through workshops and courses.
